channel.title: admin on Luis Chancí
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Luis Chancí

item.title: Energy Prices, Markups, and Productivity
item.description: This paper studies how firms’ productivity and markups respond to energy cost-shocks.

item.title: The Effects of Hiring Discrimination over the Business Cycle
item.description: We explore whether hiring discrimination implies a higher volatility of labor market outcomes for discriminated groups in the context of a standard search-and-matching model with an urn-ball matching function.

item.title: chks
item.description: User-written Stata command to estimate a Nonlinear Index and/or Zero Stochastic Frontier Models.

item.title: Export Diversification Dynamics in Latin America
item.description: In this chapter, we construct a set of export diversification measures in order to give a detailed view of export diversification dynamics in Latin America.

Welcome to my web page. My name is Luis David Chancí-Arango and I am a PhD Candidate in Economics at the State University of New York at Binghamton. I also hold an appointment as professor of economics at the U.S.T., Chile. My research interest focuses on two areas: (1) the intersection of productivity analysis and econometrics; (2) the intersection of macroeconomics and labor economics. Luis Chanci
